item.title: Create ASP.NET Core Web Application using dotnet command
item.description: In this ASP.NET tutorial, we learn how to create a new ASP.NET core web application and run the application using dotnet command via Windows Command Prompt or Linux Terminal. How to create ASP.NET core web application From your Command Prompt, run the below command to create the new project. dotnet new webapp -o HelloApp --no-https In the above command we have: dotnet new to create a new project. webapp to specify the ASP.

item.title: How to show .NET version using dotnet command
item.description: From the Command Prompt on Windows or Terminal on Linux we can show the .NET version and information using dotnet command. How to display .NET SDK version To show the .NET SDK version we can use dotnet command with option version dotnet --version Example C:\>dotnet --version 5.0.101 How to display .NET information To show .NET information on your machine we can use dotnet command with option info dotnet --info
